entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of drizzle this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
